name: StrategyYearnVECRV
description: This strategy accepts yveCRV-DAO tokens, which grant you a continuous share of Curve’s trading fees (claimed weekly as 3Crv, Curve’s 3pool LP token). Rewards are harvested, swapped for more yveCRV-DAO (either via market-buy or mint, depending on which is most efficient at time of harvest), and deposited back into the vault.
